classpackage

接口 Car

  • 所有已知实现类:
    CarFactory, SmallCar

    public interface Car

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      int addFuel(int amount)
      method to add a given number of whole Litres to the fuel tank (up to the tank's capacity) and which, after execution, indicates how much fuel was added to the tank (which will be 0 if the car is not rented or its tank is already full)
      int driveCar(int km)
      method to "drive" the car for a given number of whole Kilometres that returns the number of whole Litres of fuel consumed during the journey
      void fuelConsume(int L)
      after drive car,reduce fuel
      int getCurrentFuel()
      method to get the amount of fuel in whole Litres currently in the fuel tank
      int getMaxCapacityOfFuelTank()
      method to get the capacity in whole Litres of the car's fuel tank, which is 49 Litres for a small car and 60 Litres for a large car
      java.lang.String getRegistrationNumber()
      this method returns the car's registration number
      java.lang.String getType()
      method to get the type of car
      boolean isFullFuel()
      method that indicates whether the car's fuel tank is full or not
      boolean isRented()
      method that indicates whether the car is rented or not
      void setRented(java.lang.String status)
      after issue or terminate the contract,change the status of car

    • 方法详细资料

      • getRegistrationNumber

        java.lang.String getRegistrationNumber()
        this method returns the car's registration number
        返回:
        this car's registration number

      • getMaxCapacityOfFuelTank

        int getMaxCapacityOfFuelTank()
        method to get the capacity in whole Litres of the car's fuel tank, which is 49 Litres for a small car and 60 Litres for a large car
        返回:
        Car's capacity of fuel tank

      • getCurrentFuel

        int getCurrentFuel()
        method to get the amount of fuel in whole Litres currently in the fuel tank
        返回:
        current fuel in fuel tank

      • isFullFuel

        boolean isFullFuel()
        method that indicates whether the car's fuel tank is full or not
        返回:
        true if fuel tank is full

      • isRented

        boolean isRented()
        method that indicates whether the car is rented or not
        返回:
        true if this car is rented

      • setRented

        void setRented(java.lang.String status)
        after issue or terminate the contract,change the status of car
        参数:
        status - 1.isrented 2.notrented

      • addFuel

        int addFuel(int amount)
        method to add a given number of whole Litres to the fuel tank (up to the tank's capacity) and which, after execution, indicates how much fuel was added to the tank (which will be 0 if the car is not rented or its tank is already full)
        参数:
        amount - the amount of fuel will be given to add to fuel tank
        返回:
        actual amount add to fuel tank

      • driveCar

        int driveCar(int km)
        method to "drive" the car for a given number of whole Kilometres that returns the number of whole Litres of fuel consumed during the journey
        参数:
        km - the distance that the car will go
        返回:
        number of whole Litres of fuel consumed during the journey

      • fuelConsume

        void fuelConsume(int L)
        after drive car,reduce fuel
        参数:
        L - the amount of fuel need to reduce

      • getType

        java.lang.String getType()
        method to get the type of car
        返回:
        the type of car :small or large
